name: august (szumszept)
description:
first (kind of) game i made in bitsy!  decided to go with a little interactive poem. it's a huge experiment and done pretty much in one day so there's not a lot of content in it haha

no idea what i'm doing but i'm enjoying it immensely

walk up to the round symbols to activate the lines of the poem, the eye symbol is the end of the game

i hope you enjoy!
